patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+package drivers
+
+import (
+    "context"
+    "control-panel/ports/drivens"
+    "control-panel/ports/drivers"
+)
+
+type ControlPanelAdapter struct {
+    ytAdapter      drivers.YouTubePort
+    monitorAdapter drivens.MonitorPort
+    errorAdapter   drivens.LogsPort
+}
+
+func NewControlPanelAdapter(ctx context.Context, ytAdapter drivers.YouTubePort, monitorAdapter drivens.MonitorPort, errorAdapter drivens.LogsPort) *ControlPanelAdapter {
+    return &ControlPanelAdapter{
+        ytAdapter:      ytAdapter,
+        monitorAdapter: monitorAdapter,
+        errorAdapter:   errorAdapter,
+    }
+}
+
+func (cpa *ControlPanelAdapter) GetYouTubeData(ctx context.Context, query string) (interface{}, error) {
+    data, err := cpa.ytAdapter.GetSearching(ctx, query)
+    if err != nil {
+        cpa.errorAdapter.SaveErrorLog(ctx, models.ErrorLog{
+            ID:       "1",
+            Endpoint: "/youtube/search",
+            Usuario:  "unknown",
+            Error:    err.Error(),
+        })
+        return nil, err
+    }
+
+    cpa.monitorAdapter.SaveMonitorLog(ctx, models.MonitorLog{
+        ID:        "1",
+        Endpoint:  "/youtube/search",
+        Usuario:   "unknown",
+        Respuesta: "success",
+    })
+
+    return data, nil
+}
